description: Spirux is a company dedicated to cultivating and selling spirulina, addressing food safety and combating anemia. Originating from a Rotary Club project, the venture emphasizes social responsibility and innovation by creating appealing spirulina products, such as gummies, to encourage consumption among children and other demographics. The company operates by managing farms, employing local families, and exploring business-to-business sales channels, while also addressing challenges related to brand differentiation and environmental sustainability in spirulina production.
name: Spirux
